referralSource.title: Where did you hear about UpSkin?

rating.title: Give us a rating
rating.subtitle:
Your journey to enlightenment starts
here.

luke.name: Luna Martinez
luke.text: My crush ghosted me and I was spiraling. Asked the universe for guidance and got a message about divine timing. Two weeks later he reached out and we're closer than ever.

amelia.name: Amelia Bar
amelia.text: Kept seeing 444 everywhere after a breakup. This app helped me understand it was the universe telling me to trust the process. Three months later, everything makes sense now.

referralCode.title:
Do you have a
referral code?
referralCode.subtitle: You can skip this step.

normal.label: Normal
normal.description: Has barely visible pores, looks hydrated

oily.label: Oily
oily.description: Has large pores and an overall shine

combination.label: Combination
combination.description: Has an oily T-zone and dry or normal cheeks

notSure.label: I'm not sure
notSure.description: No worries! You'll find out with UpSkin face scan

reachGoalsSteps.step1: Use a gentle cleanser twice a day - once in the morning and once at night.
reachGoalsSteps.step2: Apply a hydrating toner or essence after cleansing.
reachGoalsSteps.step3: Limit sugar, greasy foods, and dairy.
reachGoalsSteps.step4: Avoid touching your face, using harsh scrubs, or picking at your skin.
reachGoalsSteps.step5: Wear sunscreen when out in the sun.
